profile.name: Ahmed Hassanen
profile.title: Senior Software Engineer | Cloud & DevOps Specialist
profile.bio: Passionate about building scalable and resilient software solutions. I thrive on solving complex problems and leveraging cloud technologies to create efficient and powerful applications.

about: I am a seasoned software engineer with a strong background in full-stack development, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps practices. My journey in tech has been driven by a curiosity to learn and a desire to build things that matter. I have a proven track record of designing, developing, and deploying high-quality software. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow my skills.

description: Led the design and implementation of CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment times by 40%.
Managed and scaled cloud infrastructure on AWS, ensuring high availability and performance.
Automated infrastructure provisioning using Terraform and Ansible.
Implemented monitoring and logging solutions using Prometheus and Grafana.
Developed and maintained web applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Wrote clean, maintainable, and well-tested code.
Participated in code reviews to maintain high code quality standards.

projects.title: Cloud Cost Optimizer
projects.description: A serverless application that analyzes AWS cost and usage reports to provide optimization recommendations. Built with AWS Lambda, S3, and React for the dashboard.

projects.title: Real-time Collaboration Platform
projects.description: A web-based platform for real-time document editing and collaboration, using WebSockets and a microservices architecture.

badges.title: Google IT Automation with Python Professional Certificate
